key.name: active-color

key.description: The width/spread of the glow effect in pixels

key.name: active-intensity
key.description: The intensity/brightness of the glow effect (0-100%)

key.name: passive-color
key.description: The color of the glow effect for unfocused windows

key.name: passive-width
key.description: The width/spread of the glow effect for unfocused windows

key.description: The intensity/brightness of the glow effect for unfocused windows

key.description: JSON object mapping language IDs to their glow settings (color, width, intensity)
